top_procedures.description: Established patient office or other outpatient, visit typically 25 minutes
Insertion of heart rhythm monitor under skin

Interrogation device evaluation(s), (remote) up to 30 days; implantable cardiovascular physiologic monitor system, implantable loop recorder system, or subcutaneous cardiac rhythm monitor system, remote data acquisition(s), receipt of transmissions and tec
Remote evaluations of implantable heart recorder system including transmissions, technician review, support, and distribution of results up to 30 days
Heart rhythm tracing, computer analysis, physician prescribed transmission of patient-triggered events greater than 24-hour ekg up to 30 days
Evaluation and insertion of catheters for recording, pacing, and treatment of abnormal heart rhythm
Evaluation, testing, and programming adjustment of permanent dual lead pacemaker system with physician analysis, review, and report
Insertion of new or replacement of permanent pacemaker including upper and lower chamber electrodes
Subsequent hospital inpatient care, typically 35 minutes per day
Remote evaluations of implantable heart recorder system including physician analysis, review, and report up to 30 days
Initial hospital inpatient care, typically 70 minutes per day
Remote monitoring of physiologic parameters, initial supply of devices with daily recordings or programmed alerts transmission, each 30 days
Insertion or replacement of single or dual chamber pacing defibrillator leads
Insertion of catheters for 3D mapping of electrical impulses to heart muscles
Evaluation, testing and programming adjustment of defibrillator with analysis, review and report
Remote evaluations of implantable heart monitoring system with physician analysis, review, and report up to 30 days
Evaluation and insertion of catheters for creation of complete heart block
Ultrasound examination of heart including color-depicted blood flow rate, direction, and valve function
Remote physiologic monitoring treatment management services, health care professional time in a calendar month requiring interactive communication with the patient/caregiver; first 20 minutes
Remote evaluations of single, dual, or multiple lead pacemaker with physician analysis, review, and report up to 90 days
